name: Destroy the Demon Army - Modified
description:
'Destroy the Demon Army - Modified' is a semi-idle strategy game. Recruit and upgrade your army and try to eliminate the demon army in the shortest time possible.
This game is an overhauled version of 'Destroy the demon army' . The original creators have already given consent for its production and release.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1006170/_Destroy_the_demon_army/
The game's idle speed is adjustable. Most players can finish within several minutes, and there is also a speed leaderboard.
